VPS Starter Package - $4.95/month (with coupon, just $4.85)
Use Coupon Code vps_starter
256MB Dedicated Memory
10GB Disk Space
100GB Monthly Transfer
1 X 2.40GHz Xeon Processor​

The Starter VPS (Virtual Private Server) - is the next logical step up from a shared platform. It's ideal for stand- alone services, whether you need a private proxy, small email server, VPN endpoint or DNS server.

The Starter VPS is allotted disk space and memory independent of other allocations on our server, minimizing the opportunities for one user's activities to impact others.

When you outgrow shared hosting, Virtual Private Servers offer the same complement of operating systems and software components expected from a dedicated server.

Order Now!

Use Coupon Code vps_starter_plus
512MB Dedicated Memory
10GB Disk Space
100GB Monthly Transfer
1 X 2.40GHz Xeon Processor​

The Starter Plus VPS - is a Virtual Private Server package ideally suited for small to moderately dynamic websites.

If you need to scale up your applications or services, Starter Plus VPS is the right choice. Repositories, FTP Servers and databases perform well with this VPS package.

The Starter Plus VPS is an excellent value, especially in comparison to a dedicated server.

ORDER Now

Use Coupon Code vps_personal
1024MB Dedicated Memory
40GB Disk Space
500GB Monthly Transfer
2 X 2.40GHz Xeon Processors​

The Personal VPS - provides an excellent platform for hosting large dynamic websites. It.s also makes an ideal entry-level webserver.

This package has ample memory allocation and processing power to run moderate to large dynamic websites or busy email servers.

The Personal VPS can also be used as a remote Linux desktop.

At $26.96/month, it's an affordable alternate to dedicated server hosting solutions.

The Standard VPS - is ideally suited for large dynamic websites and for hosting multiple sites.

Need to scale up your web hosting business to host lots of clients sites? This plan has the right mix of memory and processing power to host forums and complex web applications.

Running ecommerce? Forget shared hosting - move up to a virtual private server. The Standard VPS package is ideal for all types of online business. The level of control and flexibility it grants is extraordinary.

The Business Class VPS - exceeds the specifications of many dedicated servers, at a fraction of the cost.

This is one of the most robust VPS packages on the market today. It.s ideally suited for hosting tons of client sites, forums, ecommerce sites and a whole host of complex web applications.

Set up Windows terminal services, file servers, SharePoint and database applications or use this package for application development.

At just $63.96/month, it's the intelligent alternative to a dedicated server.

ORDER Now

We use CPIs Adjustable Rail QuadraRack (ARQR) and ServerRack (ARSR) - which are similar to CPIs Adjustable QuadraRack and ServerRack except that the new adjustable rail version allows you to adjust the depth of the rear equipment mounting rails after the rack is installed. Four-post racks provide a sturdy, cost-effective solution for supporting rack-mount network, computer server and data storage equipment in data centers, computer equipment rooms and other IT facilities. Self-squaring assembly with welded front and rear frames reduces assembly time. Integrated grounding and bonding features include a Two Mounting Hole Ground Terminal Block for easy attachment to the Telecommunications Grounding Busbar.
